title: Expand Brutal Friend frontend fallback quote pool

requirements.summary: Expand the BrutalFriendDialog frontend fallback brutalMessages list to include the same 30+ new brutal-motivational quotes so the UI stays consistent when the backend message is missing/empty.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/components/BrutalFriendDialog.tsx brutalMessages includes 30+ additional unique quotes (English-only) so fallback messages can be any of the added quotes.
The added quotes explicitly reference the requested themes: age (age range), other drugs/habits including games and porn, family, health, and sports performance.
No user-facing text for these messages appears in any language other than English.

file_operations.description: Append 30+ new unique brutal-friend motivational quotes (English-only) to the local brutalMessages fallback pool, ensuring explicit coverage across age/age-range, other drugs & habits (including games and porn), family, health, and sports performance, while keeping the existing cheeky/brutally-friendly tone. Keep the existing fallback selection logic intact (only used when backend message is missing/empty).
